text: Ravagers is a 1979 American science fiction action movie directed by Richard Compton and was based on the 1966 novel Path to Savagery by Robert Edmond Alter. It stars Richard Harris, Ernest Borgnine, Anthony James, Ann Turkel, Alana Stewart, Seymour Cassel and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * *Behind-the-scenes production photos Collection of Stephen Lodge. title: Ravagers (movie)
